description: These baked rissoles are packed with a variety of veggies and replace breadcrumbs with oats.
keywords: Rissoles,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Mince,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Vegetable Rissoles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the grated vegetables in a large bowl and mix in the oats, garlic and onion powder and oregano.
Add the beef mince, egg and mustard and mix well with your hands to combine.
Scoop the mix into golf ball sized rounds and flatten to form patties. Place on a lined baking tray and bake for 20 minutes.
Serve with salad, bread and sauce of your choice.
